title: @KateyKhaos Twitch missing recall SFX
body:
Hello there!

i have found a sound bug. Whenever you recall with Twitch {{champion:29}} : There is no part of his sfx. In normal case he giggles while recall-ing. But this isn't happening.
Only the recall sound of the recall pillar triggers but not his voice from his recall animation! 

Pls i want the missing sound from the Rat {{champion:29}}  back! :<

replies.body:
MightyRat,

Thanks for the report! I'm generally not on the boards over the weekend, which is why it's taken a bit for a response. We'll take a look and see why the recall is missing the VO.

Hello there!

Thank you for your time and i've also noticed this problem is since months


Good luck on it! :>

Greetings

Hello Riot KateyKhaos! :)

Do you got any hints or news for me? 
How is the bugfix going?
